TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示充当子元素集合的可滚动容器的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that act as scrollable containers for a collection of child elements.
The children of this element support .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关可以实现此控件模式的控件的示例, 请参阅[UI 自动化客户端的控件模式映射](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation

summary.span: 获取此 中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含控件模式中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已缓存的属性值之前必须使用来请求。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用属性及其用法的信息, 请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation

summary.span: 获取此 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 的当前 属性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含此控件模式的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须来自 具有引用的, 才能获取当前值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果是使用获取的, 则它只包含缓存的数据, 并且尝试获取任何属性的当前值会引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用获取以前使用指定的属性的已缓存值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用属性及其用法的信息, 请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontallyScrollableProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将一个根元素传递到一个函数, 该函数返回[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素的集合, 这些元素是根的后代并且满足一组属性条件。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalScrollPercentProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将一个根元素传递到一个函数, 该函数返回内容区域内可视区域的当前水平和垂直滚动百分比。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current horizontal and vertical scroll percentages of the viewable region within the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalViewSizeProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将一个根元素传递到一个函数, 该函数将可见区域的当前垂直和水平大小返回为总内容区域的百分比。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current vertical and horizontal sizes of the viewable region as percentages of the total content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

span.span: Specifies that scrolling should not be performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 值-1 可以替换为字段。The value -1 can be substituted for the field. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将从获取一个控件模式, 然后使用该模式将可查看区域滚动到内容区域的顶部。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 将模式标识符传递给方法 (如) , 以从指定的中检索相关的控件模式。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 从获取控件模式。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Scroll (System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount horizontalAmount, System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount verticalAmount);
.method public hidebysig instance void Scroll(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount horizontalAmount, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount verticalAmount) cil managed
Public Sub Scroll (horizontalAmount As ScrollAmount, verticalAmount As ScrollAmount)

param.name: horizontalAmount
param.span: 特定于控件的水平增量。

span.span: The horizontal increment specific to the control.

param.span: 如果不能在此方向上滚动控件，则应传入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

param.name: verticalAmount
param.span: 特定于控件的垂直增量。

span.span: The vertical increment specific to the control.

param.span: 如果不能在此方向上滚动控件，则应传入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

summary.span: 水平和垂直滚动内容区域的可见区域。

span.span: Scrolls the visible region of the content area horizontally and vertically.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将从获取一个控件模式, 然后使用该模式将元素水平或垂直滚动请求的量。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the element a requested amount either horizontally or vertically. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#106)]

exception.span: 控件仅支持用于水平或垂直滚动的 值，但传入了 值。

span.span: A control supports values exclusively for horizontal or vertical scrolling but a value is passed in.

exception.span: 尝试在不支持的方向上滚动。

span.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetScrollPercent (double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetScrollPercent(float64 horizontalPercent, float64 verticalPercent) cil managed
Public Sub SetScrollPercent (horizontalPercent As Double, verticalPercent As Double)
public: void SetScrollPercent(double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);

param.name: horizontalPercent
param.span: 总水平内容区域的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of the total horizontal content area.

param.span: 如果不能在此方向上滚动控件，则应传递 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

param.name: verticalPercent
param.span: 总垂直内容区域的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of the total vertical content area.

param.span: 如果不能在此方向上滚动控件，则应传入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

summary.span: 以 内总内容区域百分比的形式设置水平和/或垂直滚动位置。

span.span: Sets the horizontal and/or vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当控件的内容区域大于可见区域时, 此方法才有用。This method is only useful when the content area of the control is larger than the visible region. 如果传入值 , 则指示在指定方向上没有滚动。Passing in the value indicates that there is no scrolling in the specified direction. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将从获取一个控件模式, 然后使用该模式将可查看区域滚动到内容区域左上方的 "home" 位置。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top left 'home' position of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

exception.span: 传入无法转换成双精度的值。

span.span: A value that cannot be converted to a double is passed in.

exception.span: 传入了大于 100 或小于 0 的值（-1 除外，因为它等效于 ）。

span.span: A value greater than 100 or less than 0 is passed in (except -1, which is equivalent to ).

exception.span: 和 值被规范化为 0% 或 100%。

span.span: The and values are normalized to either 0% or 100%.

exception.span: 尝试在不支持的方向上滚动。

span.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
